unnormalised: Okay, mhonn konnem mhaka linear algebra kitlem mohtvachem mhonn vicharlem, khas korun tumi data science sarkhea fieldacher nodor martat zalear. Punn visvas dovrat, tem khub gorjechem! Tumkam disunk xokta calc 1, 2, ani 3 ganitachem povitr grant mhonn ani te legit mohtvache astaat, dubav na. Pun machine learningachem ganit somzunk? Linear algebra tumcho ixtt. Tem sumar 80% ganit tumi khoreponnan daktichert vapurtale. Hem mohtvachem foundation skip korunk naka.
normalised: Barobar, konnem mhaka Linear Algebra kitlem mhotvachem mhunn vicharlem, khas korun tumi Data Science sarkhea fieldancher loksh ditat zalear. Khoimch legit, tem khub mhotvachem! Tumi chintat astole Calc one, two, ani three ganitachea ut'tejim zhannam, ani te legit mhotvache asat, dubav na. Punn machine learningachea ganitacho orth lavpak? Linear Algebra tumcho ixtt. Tem sumar, tumi dar disak vaprotolea ganitachem eighty percent asa. Hi mhotvachi buniyad skip korunkam naka.

unnormalised: Zannva gheunchea vixinchi soch: data chodd korun matrices-ant organize kortat. Images pixel values-chea matrices mhonn represent kortat (zoxem, ek 256x256 image). Machine learningakhatir dataset-t chodd korun matrices mhonn represent kortat, rows samples represent kortat ani columns features represent kortat. Linear algebra hea matrices-ank manipulate ani analyze korpak sadhana dita. Matrix multiplication sarkhe operations, linear equations-chea systems zoddun kaddop (zoxem Ax = b), ani eigenvalue decomposition machine learning algorithmsak fundamental astaat. Even kitem-i simple zoxem rotation matrices vaprun korta! Tumkam SVD ani PCA sarkhe terms sampdodunk xoktat. SVD, dekhik, image compression ani recommender systems-ant vapurta. PCA (Principal Component Analysis) dimensionality reductionakhatir vapurta, 1000 dimensions 10-ant vhorpak, dekhikhatir.
normalised: Chintun polleiat: data voir voir matricesantlean manddun haddtat. Images pixel mullanchea matrices mhunn dakoitat (zoxe, don so ani pon'nas six by don so ani pon'nas six image). Machine learningache datasets voir voir matrices mhunn dakoitat, panktinnim samples dakoitat ani kolomnni features dakoitat. Linear algebra he matrices vaprunk ani tanchem vivechan korunk sadhnam dita. Matrix multiplication sarkhi kria, linear equationsanchi utram soddunk (zoxem A x barabor b), ani eigenvalue decomposition he machine learningachea algorithms khatir buniyadi asat. Even rotation sarkhi sadhi vostu matrices vapurta! Tumkam S-V-D ani P-C-A sarkhea utramchi bhetto zateli. S-V-D, dekhik, image compression ani recommender systemsant vapurtat. P-C-A (Principal Component Analysis) dimensionality reducation khatir vapurtat, ek hazar dimensions dhakhol ten, dekhik khatir.

unnormalised: Mhonnun ho, linear algebra fakt kitenxench abstract ganitacho course nhoi. Tem tumkam machine learning models koxem kam kortat tem somzunk skills dita. Fakt equations memorise korpak visorat, tumi linear algebra vaprun vostu bandunk xoktat. Tumi AI/ML vixinchi gambhir asat zalear, tem borench xinkunk vell invest korat. Tumkam pachhtav zaina! Gambhirponnan, tumchea class-achea notesak portat vo MIT 18.06 lectures sarkhe resources-antlean review korat. Tumkam underlying concepts somzunk zai ani tankam practically apply korpak zai.
normalised: Ani ho, Linear Algebra fokot ganitacho abstract course nhoi. Tem tumkam machine learning models koxe kam kortat tem somzunk zai te gunn dita. Fokot equations pott korunk visrun vochat, tumi Linear Algebra vaprun vostu bandunk xakta. Tumi A-I slash M-L babtint gambhir asat zalear, tem sarki xikonk vell ghalat. Tumi pachchtele na! Gambhirponnan, tumchea classantle notesak portat vo M-I-T eighteen point zero six lectures sarkhea resourcesantlean punraveak polleiat. Tumkam buniyadi concept somzunk zai ani te praktically vaprunk favo.
